title: Question about Free Mystery Gifts
body: I was wondering about the criteria for receiving a Mystery gift. My account has never been banned, I have never had a chat ban, I don't really play ranked so I can't have had a ranked restriction, and I have well over 10 skins available purchase. Since I'm pretty sure I meet this criterion, will I receive the mystery gift? Or does being put in the low priority queue count as some sort of ban? (I got put into it once). Any answers are appreciated :)

replies.body: you should get it, you just have to wait, i was just looking though shop when my appeared about 15-20 mins ago, just wait a bit and it will come don't worry about it
Yeah, I was a bit confused since all my friends that I play with already recieved theirs a couple hours ago. Hopefully it comes :)
it will, i was worried something was up but it finally came and i got jurassic cho gath :D pretty good even though i don't play him, still it was free :D can't complain
